snippet: Asadullah Khalid, the powerful chief of Afghanistan’s spy agency, sustained severe abdominal wounds in a suicide bombing last week.
abstract: Car bomber strikes coalition convoy outside military base in southern Afghanistan, killing one American service member and wounding three others.

byline.original: By MATTHEW ROSENBERG and THOM SHANKER

lead_paragraph: Asadullah Khalid, the powerful chief of Afghanistan’s spy agency, sustained severe abdominal wounds in a suicide bombing last week.

headline.seo: Bomber Strikes Coalition Convoy in Afghanistan
headline.main: Bomber Strikes Coalition Convoy in Afghanistan
